    • Uses of Map in com.breakfast.core.mob

      Methods in com.breakfast.core.mob with parameters of type Map 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String Mob.drop(Map map, java.lang.String item)
      drop allows the mob to remove an item from their inventory, placing it back into the inventory of the room.
      void Mob.getItem(Map map, java.lang.String item)
      getItem allows the mob to add an item from the room's inventory to the mob's inventory.
      java.lang.String Mob.look(Map map)
      look displays the description of the room, its contents (including items and people) and its availible exits
      java.lang.String Mob.move(Map map, Mob.Direction dir) 
      java.lang.String Mob.move(Map map, java.lang.String dir)
